text: The 1991 UEFA European Under-16 Championship was the ninth edition of UEFA's European Under-16 Football Championship. Switzerland hosted the championship, during May 8–18, 1991. 16 teams entered the competition, and Spain won their third title. ==Squads== ==Qualifying== ==Participants== * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
